alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Allen; Evangeline; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 3:42PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Evangeline, northeastern Acadia, central St. Landry and east central Allen Parishes through 430 PM CDT... At 342 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ville Platte to 6 miles south of Bond. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Opelousas, Eunice, Ville Platte, Church Point, Mamou, Port Barre, Washington, Chataignier, Prairie Ronde, Savoy, Duralde, Lawtell, Swords, Richard, Reddell and Grand Prairie. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 16 and 32. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for central and southwestern Louisiana.
